mint_not_revoked.description: Mint authority still active — can inflate supply

freeze_authority_active.description: Freeze authority active — can freeze holder accounts

lp_unlocked.description: Liquidity pool not locked — can rug by removing LP

suspicious_age_volume.description: Token < 1hr old with >$100K volume — pump setup

honeypot_detected.description: Buy succeeds but sell simulation fails — honeypot

sybil_holders.description: Coordinated wallet cluster detected in top holders

no_social_presence.description: No website, no Twitter, no Telegram
